subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Robert Griffin III, the former Colts executive Bill Polian said, “can put his foot in the ground and go by everybody or stop and throw it 60 yards across the field on the money.”
snippet: Robert Griffin III, the former Colts executive Bill Polian said, “can put his foot in the ground and go by everybody or stop and throw it 60 yards across the field on the money.”
